name: AmberBit
tag_list: ruby, rails, web-development, it, web-applications, applications, development, scrum, agile
overview:
AmberBit provides custom web applications development, consulting, training and coaching services.

Located in center of Europe, AmberBit develops applications that range from custom CMS engines and social networking platforms, to business data analysis, e-commerce systems and advertisement platforms.

Technology based on dynamic scripting languages, like Ruby with Rails framework, Merb, Ramaze, is used as an alternative to heavy-weight solutions that use J2EE to build web applications and web services more quickly and in line with agile project management methodologies.

AmberBit builds hybrid web-desktop-mobile applications that allow usage of the web as main content provider without giving up advantages of modern end user hardware capabilities.

Consulting and training are two of activities that AmberBit provides as a service. Technology training is based on experiences of the team with Ruby on Rails. AmberBit supports local BiaÅ‚ystok IT community by taking part in meetings, conferences and by providing free basic Ruby on Rails training sessions.
